name: API RESTful
technologies: Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Handlebars, Passport, JWT.
summary: An online store where different features can be accessed depending on your role, you can either register as an administrator or as a regular client.

name: Haku's World
technologies: Vanilla JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap and Toastify.
summary: An e-commerce that allows you to access different products, filter by different categories and carry out a purchase.

name: What To Do?
summary: A to do application to add, edit and delete information. useState and  useEffect were used to leverage Reacts function components potential.
